description:
Section 73 application for the variation to conditions 2 (approved drawings) of planning consent ref P2015/2358/FUL dated 07/9/2015 for the:

Erection of a lower ground floor level side / rear extension to form a conservatory, upper ground floor front extension, dormer extension to main rear roof slope and landscaping. 
The variation of the approved plans condition 2 seeks permission for the following alterations to the approved development: 

Side extension, lower ground floor, substitute part of the glazed roof with solid insulated roof. 
At the rear of the property, introduce a sash window with fully obscured glass at the upper ground level facing into an existing light well.

At the rear of the property, the addition of a glazed rooflight to the lower ground level to enclose the lower levels of an existing light well.

Side extension front elevation, incorporate timber casement window to match existing front elevation casement window.
Lower ground, modifications and lowering of garden levels locally and adjusted location of associated garden steps
Introduction of metal balustrade to either side of entrance path.

Main gated entrance to have double gates and alterations to existing front boundary wall including rebuilding brick pier and introduction of a new timber garden gate to match main entrance gates.
decision_conditions:
S73 - CONSENT LIMITED TO THAT OF ORIGINAL PERMISSION:  The development hereby permitted shall be begun not later than the expiration of 07/09/2018.

REASON: To ensure the commencement timescale for the development is not extended beyond that of the original planning permission granted on 07/09/2015 [LBI ref: P2015/2358/FUL]. Furthermore, to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1)(a) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended by the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004 (Chapter 5).
